verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] following through on his campaign threat and withdrawing the U.S. from the landmark nuclear accord with Iran .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: following] through [ARG1: on his campaign threat] and withdrawing the U.S. from the landmark nuclear accord with Iran .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is following through on his campaign threat and [V: withdrawing] [ARG1: the U.S.] [ARG2: from the landmark nuclear accord with Iran] .
